lgbt_meta_desc_home: Welcome to the LGBTQIA+ & friends group! We are a queer student group at Ansbach University.
lgbt_meta_desc_calendar: Feel free to drop by! Here you can find all upcoming meetings of the LGBTQIA+ & friends group.
